original: Fajers, Frans, läroverksadjunkt, Karlshamn, f. 24/6/82 i Linderöd, Krist. 1. G. 23 m. Maja Holmstedt. Barn: Carl-Martin f. 24, med. kand., Marianne 26, stud., Ingemar 37. — Stud:-ex. i Lund 03, fil. kand. 12, fil. mag. 15. Vik. adj. v. Växjö folksk:sem. 12, e. lär. i Kristianstad 12-13, vik. adj. i Västervik 13-14, e. o. adj. v. Strängnäs folksk:sem. 14-15, vik. adj. i Gävle 16-20, adj. i biol. o. geogr. v. Karlshamns samrealsk. sed. 19. Tim-lär. v. Karlshamns komm. gymn. sed. 20 o. v. Karlshamns elem:lärov. f. fl. sed. 31. Led. av stadsfullm. 37-39, ordf. o. sekr. i polisnd o. nykterh:nd, ordf. i folksk :styr., v. ordf. i hälsov:-nd, v. ’ordf. i ■soc:v:nd, ordf. i Lärov:-lär. riksförb. lokalavd. 27-46, led. av ’Styr. f. AUm. valm :förb. lökalavd., iled. av länsnykterh :ndn i Blek. 1. sed. 39, ordf. i Blek. 1. distr. av Nykterh :nämn-dernas riksförb. RVO 42.
translated: Fajers, Frans, high school teacher, Karlshamn, born on June 24th, 1882 in Linderöd, Kristianstad. Married to Maja Holmstedt in 1923. Children: Carl-Martin born in 1924, a medical graduate, Marianne born in 1926, a student, and Ingemar born in 1937. Frans passed his final high school examination in Lund in 1903, got a Bachelor's degree in 1912, and a Master's degree in 1915. He worked as a substitute teacher at Växjö people's school in 1912, as a regular teacher in Kristianstad from 1912 to 1913, as a substitute teacher in Västervik from 1913 to 1914, as a clerk at Strängnäs people's school from 1914 to 1915, as a substitute teacher in Gävle from 1916 to 1920, and as a teacher in biology and geography at Karlshamns samrealskola from 1919 onwards. He was a part-time teacher at Karlshamn municipal gymnasium from 1920, and at Karlshamns elementary school, among others, from 1931. Frans was a member of the city council from 1937 to 1939, chairman and secretary of the police and sobriety council, chairman of the people's school board, vice chairman of the health committee, vice chairman of the social committee, chairman of the local branch of the national association of high school teachers from 1927 to 1946, a member of the board of the local branch of the national association for general elections, a member of the county sobriety committee in Blekinge län since 1939, and chairman of the first district of the sobriety committees' national association in Blekinge län. Frans was appointed a Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa in 1942.

memberOf.name: National Association of High School Teachers

award.name: Knight of the Royal Order of Vasa
